properties.name: Kilurus
properties.info: Kilurus is the capital city of the Realm of Lemuria and the seat of the High King or Queen of the Clans.

properties.name: Zurast
properties.info: Once a minor city-state, the city of Zurast is now the capital of the quickly expanding Archduch of Zurast. Almost all trade flowing up or down the Sulas River travels through the trade city.

properties.name: Frecyra
properties.info: The capital of the Kingdom of Navolin, Frecyra was built around the mysterious Tower of Stantorr. It is the center of Navolinian cultural, political and military traditions.

properties.name: Axuros
properties.info: Known as "Dawn's Light", Axuros is the capital of Tovanis. The city is home to numerous temples, and is a bastion of religious freedom. Arcane pursuits, however, are banned.

properties.name: Axuros
properties.info: Known as "Dawn's Light", Axuros is the capital of Tovanis. The city is home to numerous temples, and is a bastion of religious freedom. Arcane pursuits, however, are banned.

properties.name: Enira
properties.info: The capital of Cibrin, Enira is the stronghold of Clan Godak. More of a stronghold than a city, it is said that no army has ever breached Enira's walls.

properties.name: Irulek
properties.info: The capital of the Kaeldrin Sanctum, Irulek spans the Ponerno river just south of the Sullen Fen. From here the magisters of the Kaeldrin debate philosophy and explore the wonders of arcane magicks.

properties.name: Venbrin
properties.info: Located on the isles of Sunheim off the eastern coast of Ulfwyst, the city is home to a large number of temples including the High Temple of the Maiden, the Eldergrove, and the Shrine of St. Bastlen.

properties.name: Volikgrad
properties.info: The southern-most city on the Barrier Coast, Volikgrad is a major trade hub for merchants sailing along the coast between Navolin, Zurast and Lemuria.

properties.name: Rakenburg
properties.info: The largest city-state on the Barrier Coast, Rakenburg is the defacto capital of the citys-state alliance. The city is run by and for the major guilds that control it.

properties.name: Braxinfurt
properties.info: Braxinfurt has a long standing alliance with the dwarven hold of Ezhekal, located to the west. Through trade and shared burdens, the cities have created a unique blend of cultures.

properties.name: Korasov
properties.info: Once a part of Navolin, Korasov is now a member city-state of the Barrier Coast. The city is known far and wide for its exotic wares, dangerous residents and merchants of questions ethics.

properties.name: Duskreef
properties.info: Following a major prison riot, this former fortress town for Navolinian criminals is now one of the most nutorious pirate havens in Ulfwyst.

properties.name: Tarona
properties.info: Nicknamed "Old Ivy", Tarona is the former capital of the Kingdom of Malstein before being conquered by Navolin. A center of arts and culture, the city is renowned for its architecture.

properties.name: Lyrannore
properties.info: The capital city of the Ildroun Vale, Lyrannore sits deep in the Malthor Woods. The city's design and construction is a physical reminder of the elves' respect for and control over the natural world.

properties.name: Zelmar
properties.info: Known as "the Iron Crown", Zelmar is renown for its numerous metalworks and foundries. The city also was the first to institue an extensive, formal legal code which is now widely used in Navolin.

properties.name: Rythlon
properties.info: A Village on the Sulas river, Rythlon is a minor stop-over for travlers heading overland between Tarona and the Navolinian capital of Frecyra.

properties.name: Lashkar
properties.info: The capital city of the Syrothian Empire, Lashkar is home to the great hobgoblin hordes. In its great markets can be found goods of all kinds, including slaves captured from all over.

properties.name: Blåttfelt
properties.info: Blåttfelt, or Bluefield in Common, is a small farming Village on the Svinge River. The Village, which is populated by a large number of half-elves, is known for its blueberry harvests.

properties.name: Zabrosk
properties.info: Zabrosk is a small town near the border between Lemuria and the Theocracy of Tovanis. The heavily fortified Village rests on the edge of the Greyleaf Pines, an expansive forest full of dangerous and exotic wildlife.

properties.name: Blackmoore
properties.info: Blackmoore is a small, fortified Village on the eastern shore of Lake Azajera. The Village is located near several historical battle sites, which now are marked with shrines and graveyards to ward off the threat of undead.

properties.name: Arnum
properties.info: Arnum is a free town under the protection of the city-states of the Barrier Coast. The town primary subsists on ranching on the coastal plains and fishing.

properties.name: Herslev
properties.info: Herslev is a small ranching town on the Barrier Coast. Though the town is known for its horses, most of the ranching focuses on sheep, swine and cattle.

properties.name: Kenveld
properties.info: Kenveld is a Village on the Velte River. The majority of the Village business involves processing minerals and ore mined from camps located upriver in the Jordonis Mountains.

properties.name: Romlund
properties.info: Romlund is a farming hub located on the Gudena River. The town is built around a sacred pool that is said to allow diviners to greatly enhance their powers during their rituals.

properties.name: Tånum
properties.info: Tånum is a fishing town on the Vuradel Coast. The town buildings were constructed using a dull red stone taken from numerous nearby ruins of unknown origin.

properties.name: Ozeresk
properties.info: Ozeresk is the ancestral home of Clan Tordenfødt. The city is renowned for its expert shipwrights built from the nearby Starrek Forest.

properties.name: Postek
properties.info: Postek is the ancestral home of Clan Arnbjorg located on the Svinge river. Numerous canals allow the residents to travel and move goods over water.

properties.name: Dunndag
properties.info: Dunndag is the ancestral home of Clan Villdyr, located on the Langerak river. The city's major export is hardwood from the vast Razark Timberlands to the west and both sides of the river are lined with lumbermills.

properties.name: Ketrizyn
properties.info: Ketrizyn is the set of Clan Sjomann. The city is surrounded by the forboding Everfrost Woodlands and is regulary raided by orc tribes or dangerous beasts which call the forest their home.

properties.name: Eldskog
properties.info: Eldskog is the seat of Clan Bjørsel. The city acts as the gateway into the ancient, sacred Eldskog Forest. The forest is one of the most sacred sites for followers of the Maiden. The city has a abnormally high number of lycanthropes, which is generally seen as a holy blessing by members of clan Bjørsel.

properties.name: Rastholm
properties.info: Rastholm is a large farming community with an abnormally high population of Tieflings. The town is governed by a council of elders, whose bizarre laws and decrees are commonly ignored.

properties.name: Elverun
properties.info: Elverun is built in the shadow of an ancient, six-sided keep which is said to be haunted by the warriors who failed to defend it from Cibrinian raiders centuries ago. It is also home to the Skald's Odeum, the most famous bardic college in Lemuria.

properties.name: Vorska
properties.info: Vorska is a quiet farming town on the Plavatten river. The town is known for its exotic pottery which glows in the dark due to minerals deposited by the river, likely coming from the Kazgrim Mountains.

properties.name: Relysburg
properties.info: Relysburg is a small town in the Szkania Lowlands. Acting as a hub for local farming communities, it is one of the few fortified settlements in the region.

properties.name: Govstok
properties.info: The Navolinian city of Govstok, previously the capital of the Kingdom of Azond, is a port city on the Tiderack Coast. The city is known for its fine textiles, exotic seafood and vast sugarcane fields.

properties.name: Yelant
properties.info: Yelant is a farming town located upriver from the city of Govstok. It was the site of the treaty signing that ended the Navolinian Conquest of Azond.

properties.name: Kerhoven
properties.info: Kerhoven is a sleepy, river-side town on the Sulas river. The last settlment on the road towards the Blighted Mire, the town boasts an unusually high number of inns and taverns which play host to overland travelers stopping off before heading into the bog.

properties.name: Zagora
properties.info: Zagora is the home to the largest olive groves in Ulfwyst. The town is controlled by a cartel of plantation owners who claim to have ruled the area since before the Cordus Tempus Draconis.

properties.name: Tivat
properties.info: Tivat is a coast fishing town on Zaliv Bay. The town is dominated by its ancient lighthouse and a nearby library run by the Radiant Eye.

properties.name: Thareska
properties.info: A hub town for local vinyards, Thareska was built around the mysterious "Moon Gate", a large arch of pearlescent white stone.

properties.name: Celnor
properties.info: An idyllic town built into the hillside above the sea, Celnor is the home of House of Masks, a bardic college dedicated to the Harlequin.

properties.name: Mirista
properties.info: A coastal town built around an ancient temple to an unknown god, decorated with bright lamps and golden inscriptions. In recent times the temple has been repurposed into a shrine to the Wanderer.

properties.name: Leskov
properties.info: Leskov is a small village known throughout the Wyrzek Peninsula for its Summertide Festival, a month-long event involving music, dancing and colorful costumes.

properties.name: Ostruda
properties.info: A walled town located on the twin hills of Lida and Pinsk, Ostruda overlooks Lake Vozera to the south and the Damali Steppe to the north. The town has a rich riding and ranching culture, with many prominent families owning multiple stables of horses.

properties.name: Antopa
properties.info: The town of Antopa rests on the edge of Lake Talovi. Most travelers to the town come to visit the Oculus of the Night, a stone dome with a central opening, supported by caryatid columns. The sky seen through the oculus is said to be dazzling, with magically enhanced constellations moving across the sky.

properties.name: Strysta
properties.info: A small town at the northern crossroads of the Kelishan Highlands, Strysta was once a much larger settlement. When a cult of demon worshipers was discovered to be in control of the town council, a large-scale witch hunt began, overseen by the Royal Order of Monster Hunters.

properties.name: Gresk
properties.info: Gresk is a large, logging village on the border of the Gorcien Forests. Numerous logging companies keep their headquarters in town.
